H3.text: what country did adolf hitler control. Germany

A4.text: Adolf Hitler was the dictator of Germany during the Nazi era, which lasted from 1933 until his suicide in 1945.

A5.text: Germany's invasion of Poland on 1 September 1939 under his leadership marked the outbreak of the Second World War.
